title: [Question] Can we use Xamarin SkiaSharp for cross platform desktop form development in .NET Core?
body:
I want to know Can we use SkiaSharp for cross platform desktop form development like windows forms development but for cross platform purposes ?

something like wxWidgets in C++ Can we use SkiaSharp in .NET Core for desktop development ?

Can we have forms,controls and ... by SkiaSharp ?

Is SkiaSharp could be an alternative to the Windows Forms but in cross platforms ?

comments.author: wieslawsoltes
comments.body: @HamedFathi Take a look at Avalonia https://github.com/AvaloniaUI/Avalonia, its using SkiaSharp for rendering and has WPF like XAML for UI. Its cross-platform and supports .Net Core.

comments.author: mattleibow
comments.body:
SkiaSharp is more of a drawing engine - for example it is a cross-platform version of System.Drawing or CoreGraphics.

Avalonia is a really cool example of an advanced framework that _uses_ SkiaSharp to draw the controls.
